info.name: TimeManager
info.summary: An app to track how you spend your time.
info.description:
Time tracking in Nextcloud!
* 📁 **organize time entries** based on tasks, projects and clients * ⏱ **quickly record** a time entry for your latest tasks * ✅ **check or uncheck** a time entry (e.g. to save whether you've billed it) * 📈 make use of simple, but useful **statistics**.
info.author: Thomas Ebert
